revision.text:
[[File:Farm.png|20px]] [[Farm|Farms]] with at least one fully ripe [[Berries|Berry]] can attract '''Wandering Pokémon''' that are automatically caught without the use of a [[File:Ball_Pokeball.png|20px]][[Pokéballs|Pokéball]]. Which Wandering Pokémon is attracted is based on Berry type and the farthest [[Regions|region]] you have progressed to, with all valid options having an equal chance to be encountered. Some Berries attract rare [[List_of_Obtainable_Pokémon|Pokémon]] that can be used strategically to complete a region's Pokédex. Wandering Pokémon also have a 1/1024 chance to be [[Shiny Chance|shiny]]. Attracting a shiny Wandering Pokémon when there is at least one open plot on the [[File:Farm.png|20px]] [[Farm]] plants a [[File:Starf.png|20px]] [[Starf|Starf Berry]]. ===Table of Wandering Pokémon=== {|class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Pokémon !! Ripe Berry Needed |- | [[File:Tangela.png|30px]]Tangela, [[File:Scyther.png|30px]]Scyther || Any |- | [[File:Pineco.png|30px]]Pineco, [[File:Heracross.png|30px]]Heracross || Any after reaching [[Johto]] |- | [[File:Volbeat.png|30px]]Volbeat, [[File:Illumise.png|30px]]Illumise || Any after reaching [[Hoenn]] |- | [[File:Burmy.png|30px]]Burmy (plant), [[File:Combee.png|30px]]Combee,
[[File:Cherubi.png|30px]]Cherubi, [[File:Munchlax.png|30px]]Munchlax || Any after reaching [[Sinnoh]] |- | [[File:Sewaddle.png|30px]]Sewaddle, [[File:Karrablast.png|30px]]Karrablast || Any after reaching [[Unova]] |- | [[File:Charmander.png|30px]]Charmander, [[File:Cyndaquil.png|30px]]Cyndaquil, [[File:Torchic.png|30px]]Torchic,
[[File:Chimchar.png|30px]]Chimchar, [[File:Tepig.png|30px]]Tepig, [[File:Fennekin.png|30px]]Fennekin || [[File:Occa.png|20px]] [[Occa]] |- | [[File:Squirtle.png|30px]]Squirtle, [[File:Totodile.png|30px]]Totodile, [[File:Mudkip.png|30px]]Mudkip,
[[File:Piplup.png|30px]]Piplup,[[File:Oshawott.png|30px]]Oshawott, [[File:Froakie.png|30px]]Froakie || [[File:Passho.png|20px]] [[Passho]] |- | [[File:Pikachu.png|30px]]Pikachu || [[File:Wacan.png|20px]] [[Wacan]] |- | [[File:Bulbasaur.png|30px]]Bulbasaur, [[File:Chikorita.png|30px]]Chikorita, [[File:Treecko.png|30px]]Treecko,
[[File:Turtwig.png|30px]]Turtwig, [[File:Snivy.png|30px]]Snivy, [[File:Chespin.png|30px]]Chespin || [[File:Rindo.png|20px]] [[Rindo]] |- | [[File:Snover.png|30px]]Snover || [[File:Yache.png|20px]] [[Yache]] |- | [[File:Riolu.png|30px]]Riolu || [[File:Chople.png|20px]] [[Chople]] |- | [[File:Gulpin.png|30px]]Gulpin || [[File:Kebia.png|20px]] [[Kebia]] |- | [[File:Larvitar.png|30px]]Larvitar || [[File:Shuca.png|20px]] [[Shuca]] |- | [[File:Tropius.png|30px]]Tropius || [[File:Coba.png|20px]] [[Coba]] |- | [[File:Natu.png|30px]]Natu || [[File:Payapa.png|20px]] [[Payapa]] |- | [[File:Nincada.png|30px]]Nincada || [[File:Tanga.png|20px]] [[Tanga]] |- | [[File:Sudowoodo.png|30px]]Sudowoodo || [[File:Charti.png|20px]] [[Charti]] |- | [[File:Shedinja.png|30px]]Shedinja || [[File:Kasib.png|20px]] [[Kasib]] |- | [[File:Bagon.png|30px]]Bagon || [[File:Haban.png|20px]] [[Haban]] |- | [[File:Absol.png|30px]]Absol || [[File:Colbur.png|20px]] [[Colbur]] |- | [[File:Skarmory.png|30px]]Skarmory || [[File:Babiri.png|20px]] [[Babiri]] |- | [[File:Togepi.png|30px]]Togepi || [[File:Roseli.png|20px]] [[Roseli]] |- | [[File:Manaphy.png|30px]]Manaphy || [[File:Liechi.png|20px]] [[Liechi]] |- | [[File:Mew.png|30px]]Mew || [[File:Petaya.png|20px]] [[Petaya]] |- | [[File:Jirachi.png|30px]]Jirachi || [[File:Starf.png|20px]] [[Starf]] |- | [[File:Flabébé_(Yellow).png|30px]]Flabébé (Yellow)* || Any of the following:
[[File:Aspear.png|20px]] [[Aspear]], [[File:Sitrus.png|20px]] [[Sitrus]], [[File:Pinap.png|20px]] [[Pinap]],
[[File:Iapapa.png|20px]] [[Iapapa]], [[File:Qualot.png|20px]] [[Qualot]], [[File:Grepa.png|20px]] [[Grepa]],
[[File:Nomel.png|20px]] [[Nomel]], [[File:Wacan.png|20px]] [[Wacan]], [[File:Shuca.png|20px]] [[Shuca]],
[[File:Charti.png|20px]] [[Charti]], [[File:Chilan.png|20px]] [[Chilan]], [[File:Jaboca.png|20px]] [[Jaboca]],
[[File:Kee.png|20px]] [[Kee]] |- | [[File:Flabébé_(Blue).png|30px]]Flabébé (Blue)* || Any of the following:
[[File:Oran.png|20px]] [[Oran]], [[File:Kelpsy.png|20px]] [[Kelpsy]], [[File:Passho.png|20px]] [[Passho]],
[[File:Yache.png|20px]] [[Yache]], [[File:Coba.png|20px]] [[Coba]], [[File:Rowap.png|20px]] [[Rowap]],
[[File:Maranga.png|20px]] [[Maranga]], [[File:Apicot.png|20px]] [[Apicot]] |} Note: As of version 0.8.11, [[File:Flabébé_(Yellow).png|30px]][[Pokémon with Alternate Forms|Flabébé (Yellow)]] and [[File:Flabébé_(Blue).png|30px]][[Pokémon with Alternate Forms|Flabébé (Blue)]] can only be obtained as Wandering Pokémon. ===Strategy and Wandering Pokémon Rates===
\text{Encounter Chance} = \frac{\text{Attract Aura}*\text{Ripe Berries}}{2000}       \text{Attract Aura}^{1} = {1.03}^\text{Number of Roseli}*{1.03}^\text{Number of Roseli Affected by Lum}
^{1}Attract Aura formula assumes fully grown Roseli and Lum
The base chance to encounter a Wandering Pokémon is 1/2000 every 1.5 seconds for every fully ripe Berry. [[File:Roseli.png|30px]][[Roseli|Roseli Berries]] have an Attract Aura that can multiplicatively increase this chance for all currently grown Berries on the [[File:Farm.png|20px]] [[Farm]]. Below are some examples illustrating how to improve your odds of encountering Wandering Pokémon. * Example 1: You have 1 fully grown [[File:Cheri.png|20px]][[Cheri|Cheri Berry]] when your highest region is [[Johto]]. :- Every 1.5 seconds, you have a 1/2000 or 0.05% chance of encountering a [[File:Tangela.png|30px]]Tangela, [[File:Scyther.png|30px]]Scyther, [[File:Pineco.png|30px]]Pineco, or [[File:Heracross.png|30px]]Heracross. * Example 2: You have 25 fully grown [[File:Cheri.png|20px]][[Cheri|Cheri Berries]] when your highest region is [[Johto]]. :- Every 1.5 seconds, you have a 1/80 or 1.25% chance of encountering a [[File:Tangela.png|30px]]Tangela, [[File:Scyther.png|30px]]Scyther, [[File:Pineco.png|30px]]Pineco, or [[File:Heracross.png|30px]]Heracross. * Example 3: You have 25 fully grown [[File:Liechi.png|20px]] [[Liechi|Liechi Berries]] when your highest region is [[Sinnoh]]. :- Every 1.5 seconds, you have a 1/80 or 1.25% chance of encountering a [[File:Tangela.png|30px]]Tangela, [[File:Scyther.png|30px]]Scyther, [[File:Pineco.png|30px]]Pineco, [[File:Heracross.png|30px]]Heracross, [[File:Volbeat.png|30px]]Volbeat, [[File:Illumise.png|30px]]Illumise, [[File:Burmy.png|30px]]Burmy (plant), [[File:Combee.png|30px]]Combee, [[File:Cherubi.png|30px]]Cherubi, [[File:Munchlax.png|30px]]Munchlax, or [[File:Manaphy.png|30px]]Manaphy. * Example 4: You have a fully grown [[Starf#Roseli + Lum Setup|Roseli + Lum Setup for Starf Berry]] when your highest region is [[Hoenn]]. :- Every 1.5 seconds on the 20 [[File:Roseli.png|30px]][[Roseli]] plots, you have a ~3.26% chance of encountering a [[File:Tangela.png|30px]]Tangela, [[File:Scyther.png|30px]]Scyther, [[File:Pineco.png|30px]]Pineco, [[File:Heracross.png|30px]]Heracross, [[File:Volbeat.png|30px]]Volbeat, [[File:Illumise.png|30px]]Illumise, or [[File:Togepi.png|30px]]Togepi. :- Every 1.5 seconds on the 4 [[File:Lum.png|20px]] [[Lum]] plots, you have a ~0.65% chance of encountering a [[File:Tangela.png|30px]]Tangela, [[File:Scyther.png|30px]]Scyther, [[File:Pineco.png|30px]]Pineco, [[File:Heracross.png|30px]]Heracross, [[File:Volbeat.png|30px]]Volbeat, or [[File:Illumise.png|30px]]Illumise. :- In total, this means you have a ~3.91% chance of encountering a Wandering Pokémon every 1.5 second interval. [[Category:Farm]][[Category:Berries]]

[[File:Farm.png|20px]] [[Farm|Farms]] with at least one fully ripe [[Berries|Berry]] can attract '''Wandering Pokémon''' that are automatically caught without the use of a [[File:Ball_Pokeball.png|20px]][[Pokéballs|Pokéball]]. Which Wandering Pokémon is attracted is based on Berry type and the farthest [[Regions|region]] you have progressed to, with all valid options having an equal chance to be encountered. Some Berries attract rare [[List_of_Obtainable_Pokémon|Pokémon]] that can be used strategically to complete a region's Pokédex. Wandering Pokémon also have a 1/1024 chance to be [[Shiny Chance|shiny]]. Attracting a shiny Wandering Pokémon when there is at least one open plot on the [[File:Farm.png|20px]] [[Farm]] plants a [[File:Starf.png|20px]] [[Starf|Starf Berry]]. ===Table of Wandering Pokémon=== {|class="wikitable sortable" |- ! ^{1}Attract Aura formula assumes fully grown Roseli and Lum
The base chance to encounter a Wandering Pokémon is 1/2000 every 1.5 seconds for every fully ripe Berry. [[File:Roseli.png|30px]][[Roseli|Roseli Berries]] have an Attract Aura that can multiplicatively increase this chance for all currently grown Berries on the [[File:Farm.png|20px]] [[Farm]]. Below are some examples illustrating how to improve your odds of encountering Wandering Pokémon. * Example 1: You have 1 fully grown [[File:Cheri.png|20px]][[Cheri|Cheri Berry]] when your highest region is [[Johto]]. :- Every 1.5 seconds, you have a 1/2000 or 0.05% chance of encountering a [[File:Tangela.png|30px]]Tangela, [[File:Scyther.png|30px]]Scyther, [[File:Pineco.png|30px]]Pineco, or [[File:Heracross.png|30px]]Heracross. * Example 2: You have 25 fully grown [[File:Cheri.png|20px]][[Cheri|Cheri Berries]] when your highest region is [[Johto]]. :- Every 1.5 seconds, you have a 1/80 or 1.25% chance of encountering a [[File:Tangela.png|30px]]Tangela, [[File:Scyther.png|30px]]Scyther, [[File:Pineco.png|30px]]Pineco, or [[File:Heracross.png|30px]]Heracros. * Example 3: You have 25 fully grown [[File:Liechi.png|20px]] [[Liechi|Liechi Berries]] when your highest region is [[Sinnoh]]. :- Every 1.5 seconds, you have a 1/80 or 1.25% chance of encountering a [[File:Tangela.png|30px]]Tangela, [[File:Scyther.png|30px]]Scyther, [[File:Pineco.png|30px]]Pineco, [[File:Heracross.png|30px]]Heracros, [[File:Volbeat.png|30px]]Volbeat, [[File:Illumise.png|30px]]Illumise, [[File:Burmy.png|30px]]Burmy (plant), [[File:Combee.png|30px]]Combee,
[[File:Cherubi.png|30px]]Cherubi, [[File:Munchlax.png|30px]]Munchlax, or [[File:Manaphy.png|30px]]Manaphy. * Example 4: You have a fully grown [[Starf#Roseli + Lum Setup|Roseli + Lum Setup for Starf Berry]] when your highest region is [[Hoenn]]. :- Every 1.5 seconds on the 20 [[File:Roseli.png|30px]][[Roseli]] plots, you have a ~3.26% chance of encountering a [[File:Tangela.png|30px]]Tangela, [[File:Scyther.png|30px]]Scyther, [[File:Pineco.png|30px]]Pineco, [[File:Heracross.png|30px]]Heracros, [[File:Volbeat.png|30px]]Volbeat, [[File:Illumise.png|30px]]Illumise, or [[File:Togepi.png|30px]]Togepi. :- Every 1.5 seconds on the 4 [[File:Lum.png|20px]] [[Lum]] plots, you have a ~0.65% chance of encountering a [[File:Tangela.png|30px]]Tangela, [[File:Scyther.png|30px]]Scyther, [[File:Pineco.png|30px]]Pineco, [[File:Heracross.png|30px]]Heracros, [[File:Volbeat.png|30px]]Volbeat, or [[File:Illumise.png|30px]]Illumise. :- In total, this means you have a ~3.91% chance of encountering a Wandering Pokémon every 1.5 second interval. [[Category:Farm]][[Category:Berries]]

[[File:Farm.png|20px]] [[Farm|Farms]] with at least one fully ripe [[Berries|Berry]] can attract '''Wandering Pokémon''' that are automatically caught without the use of a [[File:Ball_Pokeball.png|20px]][[Pokéballs|Pokéball]]. Which Wandering Pokémon is attracted is based on Berry type and the farthest [[Regions|region]] you have progressed to, with all valid options having an equal chance to be encountered. Some Berries attract rare [[List_of_Obtainable_Pokémon|Pokémon]] that can be used strategically to complete a region's Pokédex. Wandering Pokémon also have a 1/1024 chance to be [[Shiny Chance|shiny]]. Attracting a shiny Wandering Pokémon when there is at least one open plot on the [[File:Farm.png|20px]] [[Farm]] plants a [[File:Starf.png|20px]] [[Starf|Starf Berry]]. ===Table of Wandering Pokémon=== {|class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Pokémon !! [[File:Chimchar.png|30px]]Chimchar, [[File:Tepig.png|30px]]Tepig, [[File:Fennekin.png|30px]]Fennekin || [[File:Occa.png|20px]] [[Occa]] |- | [[File:Squirtle.png|30px]]Squirtle, [[File:Totodile.png|30px]]Totodile, [[File:Mudkip.png|30px]]Mudkip,

\text{Encounter Chance} = \frac{\text{Attract Aura}*\text{Ripe Berries}}{2000}       \text{Attract Aura}^{1} = {1.03}^\text{Number of Roseli}*{1.03}^\text{Number of Roseli Affected by Lum}

[[File:Maranga.png|20px]] [[Maranga]], [[File:Apicot.png|20px]] [[Apicot]] |} Note: As of version 0.8.11, [[Pokémon with Alternate Forms|Flabébé (Yellow)]] and [[Pokémon with Alternate Forms|Flabébé (Blue)]] can only be obtained as Wandering Pokémon. ===Strategy and Wandering Pokémon Rates=== The base chance to encounter a Wandering Pokémon is 1/2000 every 1.5 seconds for every fully ripe Berry. [[Roseli|Roseli Berries]] have an Attract Aura that can multiplicatively increase this chance for all currently grown Berries on the Farm. Below are some examples illustrating how to improve your odds of encountering Wandering Pokémon. * Example 1: You have 1 fully grown [[Cheri|Cheri Berry]] when your highest region is [[Johto]]. :- Every 1.5 seconds, you have a 1/2000 chance of encountering a Tangela, Scyther, Pineco, or Heracross. * Example 2: You have 25 fully grown [[Cheri|Cheri Berries]] when your highest region is [[Johto]]. :- Every 1.5 seconds, you have a 1/80 chance of encountering a Tangela, Scyther, Pineco, or Heracross. * Example 3: You have 25 fully grown [[Liechi|Liechi Berries]] when your highest region is [[Sinnoh]]. :- Every 1.5 seconds, you have a 1/80 chance of encountering a Tangela, Scyther, Pineco, Heracross, Volbeat, Illumise, Burmy (plant), Combee, Cherubi, Munchlax, or Manaphy. * Example 4: You have a fully grown [[Starf#Roseli + Lum Setup|Roseli + Lum Setup for Starf Berry]] when your highest region is [[Hoenn]]. :- Every 1.5 seconds on the 20 [[Roseli]] plots, you have a ~3.26% chance of encountering a Tangela, Scyther, Pineco, Heracross, Volbeat, Illumise, or Togepi. :- Every 1.5 seconds on the 4 [[Lum]] plots, you have a ~0.65% chance of encountering a Tangela, Scyther, Pineco, Heracross, Volbeat, or Illumise. :- In total, this means you have a ~3.91% chance of encountering a Wandering Pokémon every 1.5 second interval.
